channel.title: Doantor zone suggestions?
channel.description:
Hey everyone im working on a donator zone
and wanted some cords ideas and where is that red room??
and what could i use for a glass wall

item.title: Doantor zone suggestions?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Draconian Mr.Draconian
item.description:
@Mr.Draconian wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:551395”][quote author=Mr.Draconian link=topic=670310.msg4482774#msg4482774 date=1431357750]

Here’s a suggestion: Don’t do what everyone does.

Find a location on your own (It’s hard, I know. I spent over an hour looking for my home spawn coords… that includes teleporting to random locations and using noclip)

If you offer anything exclusive in the donator shop, make it be perks. Not game busters.
Ex: a ring that increases the chance of you getting a log from a tree by 10%. Not a game breaker, but still a perk people could use.

Brawler gloves?
[/quote]
Brawler gloves give exp bonuses.[/quote]

I know that would be a non-breaking reward

Read full topic

item.title: Doantor zone suggestions?

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Draconian, post:8, topic:551395”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=670310.msg4482714#msg4482714 date=1431314813]
Here’s a suggestion: Don’t do what everyone does.

Find a location on your own (It’s hard, I know. I spent over an hour looking for my home spawn coords… that includes teleporting to random locations and using noclip)

If you offer anything exclusive in the donator shop, make it be perks. Not game busters.
Ex: a ring that increases the chance of you getting a log from a tree by 10%. Not a game breaker, but still a perk people could use.
[/quote]

Brawler gloves? :)[/quote]
Brawler gloves give exp bonuses.

Read full topic

item.title: Doantor zone suggestions?
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“haviland4, post:3, topic:551395”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=670310.msg4482264#msg4482264 date=1431015254]
Don’t add overpowered stuff that can make them the most overpowered player in the game. Stick to cosmetics and maybe a few weapons/armour (decent like Dragon armour?).
[/quote]

yeah thats a good idea maybe trimmed dragon only for donators

how about cords for locations??[/quote]

Well, a lot of people use Evil Bob’s island as a donator zone.

Read full topic
